mapper.sql: id, code, enterprise_id, parent_id, status, fee, pay_fee, create_time, remark, pay_time
mapper.select:
select
from ysh_enterprise_requisition where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} for update

select req.id, req.code, req.enterprise_id, req.parent_id, req.status, req.fee, req.pay_fee, req.create_time, req.remark, req.pay_time, ent.enterprise_name from ysh_enterprise_requisition as req left join ysh_enterprise_info as ent ON req.enterprise_id = ent.enterprise_id where code = #{code,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ysh_enterprise_requisition (code, enterprise_id, parent_id, status, fee, pay_fee, create_time, remark, pay_time) values (#{code,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
